content.rendered:
In a weekend full of upsets on bodybuilding’s biggest stage, Mamdouh “Big Ramy” Elssbiay took the title from reigning champ Brandon Curry.

Here are the 2020 Mr. Olympia top 5: 

  1. Mamdouh “Big Ramy” Elssbiay
  2. Brandon Curry
  3. Phil Heath
  4. Hadi Choopan
  5. William Bonac
